attributes.action: Keep mandatory mask wearing on public transport and in shops after 19 July 2021
attributes.additional_details:
The government is playing Russian roulette with our lives and our health. Scarily, it’s children’s health at risk here as they haven’t been vaccinated, and it’s likely there will be a new variant of concern if we let Covid rip through our community. 

Boris Johnson has made clear that how people protect themselves and others now is a matter of personal responsibility. This is a complete abdication of government responsibility. 

We are risking long Covid surges and dangerous new variants.
attributes.background:
Not even 50% of the UK population have been double vaccinated.

Herd immunity target has increased to 85% as the Delta variant is so much more transmissible.
We need to keep mask wearing measures in place until more people have been vaccinated. 

Masks are proved to reduce transmission.

rejection.details:
Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616
 
Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694
